items.name: I'm a Clown
items.description: I opened a bunch of Loot Boxes and all I got was this stupid clown decoration. Exclusive to April Fools 2024 for a limited time.

items.name: Mokoko
items.description: An affectionate Mokoko wants to give you plenty of hugs! Exclusive to Mokoko Quest 2024 for a limited time.

items.name: Gyoiko Sakura
items.description: A rare blossom only seen by a fortunate few. Given to new nitro subscribers between April 24, 2024 and May 1, 2024.

items.name: Warp Helmet
items.description: Traveling at the speed of light. Available to use until September 9, 2024.

items.name: Fortnite Victory Crown
items.description: A sparkly crown! Available to use until September 3, 2024.

items.name: Freezer Bunny Lovebug
items.description: A Sim's coolest companion! Available to use until September 30, 2024.

items.name: Wingman Boba
items.description: Your trusty VALORANT buddy, with a refreshing bubbly twist. Available to use until October 6, 2024.

items.name: Los Santos
items.description: Get to the chopper! Los Santos sky-high pursuit! Available to use until October 14, 2024.

items.name: Hailey
items.description: Worn by the legendary sniper in The First Descendant. Available until to use November 6, 2024.

items.name: Bunny
items.description: Worn by Albion's speedster, Bunny, in The First Descendant. Available until to use November 12, 2024.

items.name: Torgal Puppy
items.description: Torgal the puppy is here to keep you company! This reward is exclusive to the FFXVI Quest. Available until to use November 23, 2024.

items.name: Street Fighter 6 Battle Field
items.description: Avatar Decoration for the Award winning Street Fighter 6. Exclusive to Street Fighter 6 Quest for a limited time. Available until to use November 29, 2024.

items.name: Wolf Morph
items.description: Your Morph can take on many unique forms and help you move throughout the world in THRONE AND LIBERTY. Available until to use November 30, 2024.

items.name: Wallach IX Spaceport
items.description: The Wallach IX Spaceport is a dynamic port for space travel on the planet Wallach IX. This reward is exclusive to the Dune: Prophecy Quest. Available until to use January 25, 2025.

items.name: Batarang
items.description: The Batarang is Batman’s legendary throwing weapon, blending precision and versatility to instill fear in his enemies. This reward is exclusive to the Become the Knight Quest. Available until to use February 8, 2025.

items.name: Rift Butterfly
items.description: The Rift Butterfly is a type of sentient Rift that is shaped like a butterfly. This reward is exclusive to the Fortnite Quest. Available until to use February 5, 2025.

items.description: This decoration has not been officially released yet.

items.description: This decoration has not been officially released yet.
